Summarise an 'mreg' object

summary.mreg.Rd

Summarize an object of class "mreg".

# S3 method for mreg
summary(x, k = 5)

Arguments

x

an object of class "mreg", a result of a call to mreg (which is a wrapper for lm)
k

number of folds for cross validated performance

Value

The function summary.mreg computes summary statistics and results for a fitted linear model with measures of robustness including:

fit.indices

includes R-squared, Adjusted R-squared, Akaike's Information Criterion, Root Mean Squared Error

cv.indices

includes a more reliable and accurate measure of R-squared, Root Mean Squared Error

Ftest

includes F-statistic, Degrees of Freedom, p-value

anova.table

includes a Type-III Analysis of Variance Table (outputted from the Anova() function in the car package)

coefficient.table

includes a table of Coefficients, Standardised Coefficients, Standard Errors, t-values, p-values, Significance codes

k

number of folds for cross-validation

N

sample size

Examples

fit <- mreg(mpg ~ hp + wt + accel + origin, data = auto_mpg)
summary(fit)

#> MULTIPLE REGRESSION SUMMARY 
#> Model: mpg ~ hp + wt + accel + origin
#> Data : auto_mpg
#> N    : 392
#> 
#> Fit Indices 
#>  R.Squared Adj.R.Squared  AIC RMSE
#>      0.719         0.716 2238 4.13
#> 
#> 5-Fold Cross Validated Fit Indices: 
#>  R.Squared RMSE
#>      0.714 4.19
#> 
#> Omnibus Test 
#> F(5,386) = 197.852, p < <2e-16  *** 
#> 
#> Anova Table (type III tests) 
#>               Sum Sq  DF F value Pr(>F)    
#> (Intercept) 5473.655   1 316.038 <0.001 ***
#> hp           220.431   1  12.727 <0.001 ***
#> wt          1017.753   1  58.763 <0.001 ***
#> accel          1.117   1   0.065    0.8    
#> origin       308.474   2   8.905 <0.001 ***
#> Residuals   6685.366 386                   
#> 
#> Regression Coefficients 
#>                    B      B*       SE      t Pr(>|t|)    
#> (Intercept) 43.29141 -0.0928 2.435185 17.777 4.41e-52 ***
#> hp          -0.05643 -0.2783 0.015818 -3.568 4.06e-04 ***
#> wt          -0.00477 -0.5188 0.000622 -7.666 1.46e-13 ***
#> accel       -0.03085 -0.0109 0.121477 -0.254 8.00e-01    
#> origin2      0.97656  0.1251 0.643910  1.517 1.30e-01    
#> origin3      2.75244  0.3527 0.653731  4.210 3.18e-05 ***
